file_content.text: Thank you again for taking out those pirates.
Major Orpharya? The pirates are dead.
What? I thought I told Nollus to call off the mission. Fool never has known when to quit.
Going into that nest of pirates was just plain suicidal. How did you do it?
First I took a durasteel can opener and some old Jawa juice and rigged a bomb....
That's the single most convoluted explanation I've ever heard, but thank you.
I'm glad it was you and not Nollus who went in. We can't afford any more dead soldiers. Thank you.
Where is that Praetor Nollus? I called his mission off!
